design.name: Semantic UI for Sketch
design.description: Sketch Prototyping Kit and Style Guide Generator for Semantic UI

design.name: Sketch Data Table Components
design.description: I had to design a table for a client in Sketch, so I did a quick search for dynamic Sketch table symbols/components, and I couldn't track anything down that was actually dynamic. Most tables were 'hard coded' in a sense, with their columns and rows defined by line shapes, instead of individual cells, making it impossible to change the table format beyond the template. So I set off and created my own dynamic Sketch table and decided to share it with everyone(because tables are hard enough right? ðŸ˜…ðŸ˜µ)
